entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 09:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SE 34 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm inland. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon then to 60 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
